mapper.sql: i.id, i.title, i.sell_point as sellPoint, FORMAT(i.price/100,2) AS priceView, i.num, i.barcode, i.image, i.cid, i.status, i.created, DATE_FORMAT(i.updated,'%Y-%m-%d') AS updatedTime, c.name as catName, CASE i.status WHEN 1 THEN "正常" WHEN 2 THEN "下架" WHEN 3 THEN "删除" ELSE "未知" END AS statusName
mapper.select: select count(1) from tb_item where status != 3

SELECT
FROM tb_item i LEFT JOIN tb_item_cat c ON i.cid = c.id where i.status != 3 ORDER BY i.id DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{rows}
